name: Baby Butter Creme
description: Details: This delicate creme is designed for your baby's hair & skin. A gentle blend of Organic Aloe, Shea Nilotica, & Lavender butters ensures your little one has a safe, soothing experience. Perfect for inducing calmness right before bed. To use: Apply small amount onto desired area until absorbed. If using on hair, style as usual. Best applied after a bath & before bedtime. Ingredients: Organic Aloe butter, Organic Nilotica Shea butter, Lavender butter, Safflower oil, Lemon essential oil, Chamomile essential oil See the benefits of our ingredients.

name: Hemp Seed Styling Cream
description: Details: This light green styling cream is designed for definition. Great for natural hair twists, braids, or Bantu knots. Keeps hair defined & soft for added emphasis on curls. Comes in a wonderful mix of tropical mango, citrus, & lime scent that blend well into hair for lasting aroma. To use: Dampen hair lightly with water or Aloe Vera juice & rub small amount onto desired area until absorbed. Style as usual. Ingredients: Unrefined Hemp Seed oil, Aloe Vera Gel, Natural Flax Seed gel, Organic Fair Trade Nilotica Shea butter, Emulsifying wax, Mango Papaya fragrance oil, Lime essential oil, Willow Bark extract (preservative) See the benefits of our ingredients. Products are made-to-order. Unscented option available upon request.

name: BeautyBerry Sugar Scrub
description: Details: This pink eye-popping sugar scrub is great for exfoliating dead skin from your hands, feet, & body. Made with fine sugar crystals dyed with natural cherry concentrate. The cherry concentrate has awesome skin cell renewing properties & aids in the shedding of dead skin cells. Fresh, locally grown American Beautyberries are also crushed into the scrub for their ability to relieve achy muscles & their gorgeous color. And lastly, purple & pink jojoba beads are included for extra exfoliation action. Directions: Use during showers or bath & apply on desired areas. Rinse until smooth and moisturize skin with Silky Butter Pomade or Whipped Butter Creme for maximum results. Ingredients: Fine sugar crystals, Organic Virgin Coconut oil, Olive oil, Sweet Almond oil, American Beautyberries, Pink Jojoba beads, Purple Jojoba beads, Tart Cherry Concentrate, mixed berry fragrance oil See the benefits of our ingredients.

name: Pumpkin Spice Bath & Body Set
description:
Details: This Pumpkin Spice Bath & Body Set is a great seasonal product that'll have your skin super soft & extra moisturized for the colder months. The perfect aromatic mix of pumpkin spice fragrance with hints of vanilla & lemon will leave you smelling deliciously wonderful.

Directions: Use the Pumpkin Spice Sugar Scrub for relaxing body & foot rubs or soaks. Follow up with Pumpkin Spice Cream on clean, damp skin to seal in moisture.

Pumpkin Spice Cream Ingredients: Pumpkin butter, Organic Virgin Coconut oil, Organic Fair Trade Nilotica Shea butter, Organic Aloe butter, Pumpkin seed oil, Pumpkin Spice fragrance oil, Lemon essential oil, & Vanilla essential oil

Pumpkin Spice Sugar Scrub Ingredients: Fine Sugar Crystals, Organic Pumpkin seed oil, Organic Virgin Coconut oil, Organic Olive oil, Orange Jojoba beads, Pumpkin Spice fragrance oil, Lemon essential oil, & Vanilla essential oil

name: Cocoa Kisses Body Butter
description: Details: This thick 'n lovely body butter is carefully crafted with Organic Raw Cocoa butter, skin softening Organic Virgin Coconut oil, & anti-aging Meadowfoam oil. Cocoa butter is the perfect ingredient for evening skin tone & treating dryness while the Meadowfoam oil absorbs into skin cells to treat aging, wrinkles, & blemishes. Recommended for dry, aged skin, stretch marks, & scars. Comes in 3 great scents to complement the rich, soothing aroma of the Cocoa butter. Directions: Rub amount onto desired area until absorbed. Ingredients: Organic Raw Cocoa butter, Organic Virgin Coconut oil, Meadowfoam oil, Sweet Almond oil, Jojoba oil, various essential and fragrance oils* See the benefits of our ingredients. *All products are made-to-order. Oils vary upon request.

name: Honey Brown Sugar Scrub
description: Details: This sweet, sudsy, sugar scrub, mixed with coconut & sweet almond oil is great for exfoliating dead skin from your face, feet, & body. It'll leave your skin delicate, soft, and moisturized after each use. Directions: Use during showers or bath & apply on desired areas. Rinse until smooth and moisturize skin with Silky Butter Pomade or Whipped Butter Creme for maximum results. Ingredients: Organic dark brown sugar, castille soap, coconut oil, sweet almond oil, vanilla essential oil, raw organic honey, ylang ylang essential oil, various essential and fragrance oils* See the benefits of our ingredients. *All products are made-to-order. Oils vary upon request.

name: Aromatic Bath & Body Sets
description:
Details: These Aromatic Bath & Body Sets come with an Aromatic Salt Soak & Scrub & Aromatic Body Butter. With 4 unique & customized blends of essentials oils, choose the set that best suites your body's aromatherapy needs.

Directions: Use the Aromatic Salt Soak & Scrub for relaxing evening baths or foot rubs/soaks. Follow up with Aromatic Body Butter on clean, damp skin to seal in moisture.

Aromatic Salt Soak & Scrub Ingredients: Dead sea salt, Epsom salt, Organic Safflower oil, Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Organic Sweet Almond oil, Aromatic essential oil blend

Aromatic Body Butter Ingredients: Organic Fair Trade Nilotica Shea butter, Organic Aloe butter, Organic Virgin Coconut oil, Organic Extra Virgin Olive oil, Organic Sweet Almond oil, Aromatic essential oil blend

Soothe & Sleep Aromatic Blend - Lavender, Bergamot, Chamomile, Ylang ylang, Sweet marjoram, & Jasmine essential oils. Excellent blend for those restless nights. These oils work great to clear the mind & ease the body so you can get a full night of sleep.

Rest & Relax Aromatic Blend - Ylang Ylang, Patcholi, Lemon, Sandalwood, & Geranium essential oils. This specific blend is great for relieving anxiety after a stressful day or to unwind from everyday wear & tear.

Energizing Aromatic Blend - Orange, Peppermint, Rosemary, & Thyme essential oils. A great way to invigorate your mind & stay alert for the day ahead. Also great to use for a mid-day refresher after lunch.

Health & Healing Aromatic Blend - Arnica, Calendula, Basil, Clary Sage, & Eucalyptus essential oils. This blend is perfect for those with a very active lifestyle. Use this blend to combat soreness, bruising, sprains, & achiness from workouts or injuries. Also great for tired, achy feet.

**Items are sold separately or as a set**

name: Rejuvenating Clay Cleanser
description: Details: This dynamic clay cleanser is a mixture of purifying clay minerals, moisturizing carrier oils, and plant extracts that help repair dry/damaged hair and/or skin. This specialized blend is great to use on hair, especially those looking to define their natural curls, prevent dryness, and retain length. This product is also good to use as a facial mask to cleanse and hydrate the skin. To use on hair: Wet hair completely and section into 4 to 6 parts. Apply mixture using fingertips, making sure to massage into scalp and coat hair strands. Twist each section and apply conditioning cap for up to 15 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and style. *See more detailed instructions To use on skin: Dampen face (and body if desired) with water and rub desired amount onto skin, avoiding sensitive areas like the eyes and mouth. Allow the clay to dry (15 to 20 minutes) and rinse with warm water. Moisturize as needed. Ingredients: Distilled water, vegetable glycerin, Australian beige clay, French pink clay, Kaolin clay, Rhassoul clay, safflower oil, ylang ylang essential oil, burdock root powder, horsetail powder, nettle root powder, vitamin E oil, various essential and fragrance oils* See the benefits of our ingredients. Read Rejuvenating Clay Cleanser customer reviews. *Products are made-to-order. Oils vary upon request. **Due to the naturalness of this product, be sure to store in a fridge to extend the shelf life.

name: Luscious Leave-In Conditioner
description: Details: This rich and creamy conditioner is the perfect elixir to add moisture and softness to your hair. This mixture gives your hair a silky texture, perfect for those who enjoy the carefree wash-n-go style. To use: Coat strands with desired amount of product, making sure not to heavily saturate the roots. Do not rinse and style hair as usual. Ingredients: Aloe Vera juice, Glycerin, Avocado butter, Organic Fair Trade Nilotica Shea butter, Organic virgin coconut oil, Jojoba oil, Organic extra virgin olive oil, Vitamin E oil, Emulsifying wax, various essential and fragrance oil* See the benefits of our ingredients. Read Luscious Leave-In Conditioner customer reviews. *All products are made-to-order. Oils vary upon request.

name: Silky Butter Pomade
description: Details: This rich pomade is excellent for hair, skin, and nails. A special blend of organic & natural butters & oils makes this an excellent blend to add shine and moisture to your curls & natural hair styles. Use on skin to moisturize after a shower or use as a relaxing massage treatment. To use: Use as is or melt down for a great hot oil treatment or massage oil. Apply small amount onto desired area until absorbed. If using on hair, style as usual. Ingredients: Organic Virgin Coconut oil, Organic Aloe butter, Avocado butter, Mango butter, Organic Nilotica Shea butter, Grapeseed oil, Jamaican Black Castor oil, Macadamia Nut oil, Organic Extra Virgin Olive oil, Sweet Almond oil, Argan oil, various essential and fragrance oils* See the benefits of our ingredients. Read Silky Butter Pomade customer reviews. *All products are made-to-order. Oils vary upon request.

name: Whipped Butter Creme
description: Details: This lightly textured butter is great for sealing moisture into your hair or skin. Perfectly versatile product that works wonders on eczema, psoriasis, or dry scalp. Use on thin edges and watch as they thicken in as little as 2 weeks. This product is awesome on natural hair & curls or for those looking to transition. If you have issues keeping your hair soft & moisturized, this is the product for you. Read Whipped Butter Creme customer reviews. To use: Rub small amount onto desired area until absorbed. If using on hair, style as usual. Ingredients: Organic Aloe butter, Avocado butter, Mango butter, Organic Nilotica Shea butter, Organic Virgin Coconut oil, Grapeseed oil, Jamaican Black Castor oil, Macadamia Nut oil, Olive oil, Sweet Almond oil, Argan oil, various essential and fragrance oils* See the benefits of our ingredients our ingredients. *All products are made-to-order. Oils vary upon request.
